subject: Check out the latest evolution of CNN.com
body:
Check out the latest evolution of CNN.com
















Watch Now:

















The full story at your fingertips.

Announcing a better way to experience the world on CNN.com. Now watch up-to-the-minute news unfold firsthand in higher quality video and bigger screen sizes. This enhanced news experience puts you right at the scene of the story - and it doesn't cost you a thing.

Lean in for the breaking news. Kick back for entertainment clips, offbeat buzz, and more. With faster access to videos that play right within the story, CNN.com delivers it all as it happens, as we always have. Now it's like you're at the scene - seeing it live in real-time streaming video.

Here's some of what you'll find right now:
• Free LIVE and on-demand Video
• All on one page: instantly access articles, videos, pictures, timelines, charts
• Faster access to videos that play in the story
• Larger video screens
EXPERIENCE the enhanced world of online news now on CNN.com.

-The CNN.com Team











							More video.More news.More people saying,













Make sure you receive our e-mails. Please add 
 
CNN@access.cnn.com to your address book.
You are receiving this e-mail because you have agreed to receive notice of new features and special offers from CNN.com.
